features: 🏆【Safe Material with Humane Design】 The baby musical toys is made of eco-friendly ABS plastic material that is BPA-free, Lead-free and accordant with Food Grade standard. The humane Round-Edging Design well avoids harm to your little baby’s hands. Your baby will never touch the batteries as the batteries are fully covered with screws. Soft LED Lights will not harm to baby’s eyes.

🎷【4 Musical Playing Modes】The Kids Musical Instruments is powered by three 1.5V AA batteries (not included). The musical instruments possess 4 musical modes: (a) 3 hand drums with red,blue and orange colors; (b) 6 blue keys with cute & vivid animal pattern to send out animal sound effect accordingly ; (c) 3 play sound effects of guitar, trumpet, sax.The wonderful first musical instrument GIFT to your baby to open up their world by listening to adorable animal sounds and sweet songs.

🎹【Benefits to Baby’s Educational Development】(1) Enhance your baby’s eye-hand coordination and finger flexibility whilst hitting hand drum /keyboard to enjoy various sounds ; (2)Develop their cognitive competence of colors, patterns and animals ; (3) Form a good concentration. This toddler drum set is a great fun toy to nurture your baby’s intelligence, creativity, imagination, cognition ,coordination and auditory sensory.

🎻【Save Time to Calm your Child】It is a useful way to gain various skills through play from Kingsdragon musical piano drum toys in your baby’s early preschool stage.With cute shape,colorful buttons,various animal sound effect,all of these interesting features will attract your baby’s attention to focus on their own colorful concert.It saves time to calm and soothe your baby as this 2 in 1 piano drum set triggers your child’s interest and stimulates his curiosity towards sound and colors.

📩【Satisfaction Guarantee】Kingsdragon music toys are high quality made with durable material.With multiple times of strict tests and Quality Certification Approved,we can assure you this drum piano set toy has a robust built that could last long.Kingsdragon stand by our all products so if you have any question, feel free to contact us.We offer 24 per day,7 days per week premium service.Your satisfaction comes first !!

With round edge design, this piano drum set toy will not get your babies’ hands injured.With such vivid and colorful design, your baby will fall in love with this musical instrument toy and will focus on his/her own concert benefit to form a great independence and discipline.
Musical Piano Drum Keyboard can send out different interesting sounds helpful to your baby's early educational recognization ! Different Drums' Sound Musical Instruments Sounds Various Animal Sounds

KingsDragon piano and drum musical instruments is a perfect educational toy beneficial to babies’ development (1)Different sounds allow baby to perceive temperament; (2)Promote baby’s brain development and improve memory; (3)Develop baby’s musical talent; (4)Exercise your baby’s finger constantly; (5)Training baby tactile to promote hand-eye coordination It is a great toy for baby in 6 months and up.It is a great birthday gift combined with education and endless fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for toddlers to play with.
reviews.reviewText: Love this piano/drum toy. Kids are going to love this item very much. It has a volume for lower volume and higher volume. there are different ways to play too. There is the drums on top and the piano has alphabets, music, and different piano sounds too. This is a great gift for toddlers and other children to play with. It was a good deal on the price I paid too. It is a discount price for a great item that cost more than usual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this toy!
reviews.reviewText: Awesome toy for all ages! Bought this for my 9 month old and she lovessss it. It’s great for all ages. I would think even a 4 or 5 year old would love it too. It’s colorful and quality material. It Even has storage for the drum sticks!! which I love , so we don’t lose them ..there is a volume control and a whack a mole feature which is fun for anyone . It’s a great learning tool and also has fun animal sounds . The baby love the music, sounds and colors! This toy is perfect! I highly recommend to anyone for a variety of ages . It’s more than I expected . I was so pleasantly surprised for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for a wide age range
reviews.reviewText: I was seriously suprised by this toy! I got it for my 18 month old, but all of my kids have enjoyed playing with it even up to my oldest who is 9. So many different educational settings, I even learned something new from it. "Solmization" is the correct term for the 'do-re-mi-fa-so-la-ti-do' scales, who knew?! Thanks to this toy now I do!I like the more muted color scale rather than the bright primary colors that baby toys typically have.Some other reviews talked about the volume being too loud, that issue seems to have been addressed because it is not too loud at all.I like the storage area underneath for the drumsticks. I like that its multiple toys in one (piano, xylophone, drums) The whack-a-mole game setting is so fun.All in all if you are looking for a musical toy with a variety of options for a baby/toddler age I definitely recommend this toy and it will continue to be fun for them to grow with for years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great toy for babies that like to SMACK
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas and it's been a big hit so far (she was 7 months when she got it and is still a big fan of it at 9 months). The only complaint I have is the volume control; it does have 3 different volume settings but the button to control the volume is a large green button on top of the toy near other buttons meant for the baby to play. For parents' sanity, it would've been nice for the volume control to be harder for baby to adjust, but overall it's a great toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great interactive toy for young kids
reviews.reviewText: My 20 month old loved this product ! She had fun pressing the different buttons to produce sounds and banging on the drums. Definitely very entertaining for a toddler and it is well made and seems like it will last for a long time. My child loves using this toy to make music and explore producing different sounds. It’s good that the battery pack can only be opened with a screwdriver so the child cannot take them out. The only feedback I have is the volume button is near the other buttons so the child might increase the sound to high and it could get annoying. I would prefer the volume button to be on the side so it’s something the adult can control . Overall it’s a great product that I highly recommend !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Volume Button for the Win!
reviews.reviewText: We all know that kids love toys that make sounds and light up. This one is no different. It can work as a regular piano and drums, it plays songs, and it plays animal sounds. The drums light up which helps keep babies engaged. The biggest perk to this toy is the volume button! It can definitely be loud, but the lowest setting actually isn't that bad at all. Very cool feature that I'm sure I'll be using pretty often. The only downside is that the volume button is on the front like the rest of the buttons, so baby can easily press it on his own and change the volume quickly. Thankfully, the off switch is on the back and only I can control that one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Christmas present for grandson. He enjoys banging on the drums and seeing the lights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fun toy, but volume button placement is bad
reviews.reviewText: My 8 months old enjoys this toy. The only downside I have for this is that the volume control is a button you push three times to cycle through loud, medium and quiet and that button is on the top of the toy so my 8 months old naturally pushes it just as much as the other buttons. Would be nice if volume was on the bottom of the toy or was a switch that is harder for a baby to toggle. Otherwise the sounds are fun and it serves it's purpose.
